org.eclipse.update.configurator

Class ConfiguratorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.update.configurator.ConfiguratorUtils
  • Deprecated. 
    The org.eclipse.update component has been replaced by Equinox p2. This API will be deleted in a future release. See bug 311590 for details.

    public class ConfiguratorUtils
extends Object
    Helper class to get platform configuration data without having to use BootLoader methods from the compatibility layer.

    Note: This class/interface is part of an interim API that is still under development and expected to change significantly before reaching stability. It is being made available at this early stage to solicit feedback from pioneering adopters on the understanding that any code that uses this API will almost certainly be broken (repeatedly) as the API evolves.

    Since:
    3.0

      • getCurrentPlatformConfiguration

        public static IPlatformConfiguration getCurrentPlatformConfiguration()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the current platform configuration. This method replaces the one we used to call on BootLoader.
        Returns:
        platform configuration used in current instance of platform
        Since:
        3.0

      • getPlatformConfiguration

        public static IPlatformConfiguration getPlatformConfiguration(URL url)
                                                       throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a platform configuration object, optionally initialized with previously saved configuration information. We will use this method instead of the old one in BootLoader.
        Parameters:
        url - location of previously save configuration information. If null is specified, an empty configuration object is returned
        Returns:
        platform configuration used in current instance of platform
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPlatformConfiguration

        public static IPlatformConfiguration getPlatformConfiguration(URL url,
                                              URL loc)
                                                       throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a platform configuration object, optionally initialized with previously saved configuration information. We will use this method instead of the old one in BootLoader.
        Parameters:
        url - location of previously save configuration information. If null is specified, an empty configuration object is returned
        loc - location of the platform installation. Used to resolve entries in the save location
        Returns:
        platform configuration used in current instance of platform
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getInstallURL

        public static URL getInstallURL()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the URL of this eclispe installation
